attractions.name: Osaka Castle
attractions.description: Iconic Japanese castle surrounded by a large park and museum showcasing samurai history.

attractions.name: Dotonbori
attractions.description: Lively entertainment district known for neon lights, street food, and the Glico sign.

attractions.name: Universal Studios Japan
attractions.description: Popular theme park featuring rides, attractions, and shows based on Hollywood movies.

attractions.name: Umeda Sky Building
attractions.description: Futuristic skyscraper with a floating garden observatory offering panoramic views of Osaka.

attractions.name: Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan
attractions.description: One of the largest aquariums in the world, featuring marine life from the Pacific Ring of Fire.
